subject: Football
lead_paragraph: The Giants have a must-win road game against the Miami Dolphins on Monday night, and they are eager to rediscover the smash-mouth style that has served them so well under Coach Tom Coughlin.
snippet: The Giants have a must-win road game against the Miami Dolphins on Monday night, and they are eager to rediscover the smash-mouth style that has served them so well under Coach Tom Coughlin.
